mapper.select: SELECT FORMAT(@ROWNUM := @ROWNUM+1, 0) AS ROWIDX , S.IDX , S.USER_ID , S.NAME , S.ALL_TYPE_NAME , S.SUBJECTS , CONCAT(S.TIME1, ' ', S.TIME2, ', ', S.TIME3, ' ', S.TIME4) AS TIME , S.GRADES , S.INPUT_NAME , IFNULL(S.ETC, '없음') AS ETC , S.CNT FROM ( SELECT A.IDX , B.CNT , B.NAME , B.ALL_TYPE_NAME , A.USER_ID , A.SUBJECTS , (CASE WHEN B.TIME1 IN('1','2','3','4','5', '6', '7', '8') THEN '월요일' WHEN B.TIME1 IN('9','10','11','12','13', '14', '15', '16') THEN '화요일' WHEN B.TIME1 IN('17','18','19','20','21', '22', '23', '24') THEN '수요일' WHEN B.TIME1 IN('25','26','27','28','29', '30', '31', '32') THEN '목요일' WHEN B.TIME1 IN('33','34','35','36','37', '38', '39', '40') THEN '금요일' END) AS TIME1 , (CASE WHEN B.TIME1 IN('1','9','17','25','33') THEN '1교시' WHEN B.TIME1 IN('2','10','18','26','34') THEN '2교시' WHEN B.TIME1 IN('3','11','19','27','35') THEN '3교시' WHEN B.TIME1 IN('4','12','20','28','36') THEN '4교시' WHEN B.TIME1 IN('5','13','21','29','37') THEN '5교시' WHEN B.TIME1 IN('6','14','22','30','38') THEN '6교시' WHEN B.TIME1 IN('7','15','23','31','39') THEN '7교시' WHEN B.TIME1 IN('8','16','24','32','40') THEN '8교시' END) AS TIME2 , (CASE WHEN B.TIME2 IN('1','2','3','4','5', '6', '7', '8') THEN '월요일' WHEN B.TIME2 IN('9','10','11','12','13', '14', '15', '16') THEN '화요일' WHEN B.TIME2 IN('17','18','19','20','21', '22', '23', '24') THEN '수요일' WHEN B.TIME2 IN('25','26','27','28','29', '30', '31', '32') THEN '목요일' WHEN B.TIME2 IN('33','34','35','36','37', '38', '39', '40') THEN '금요일' ELSE '다음 교시' END) AS TIME3 , (CASE WHEN B.TIME2 IN('1','9','17','25','33') THEN '1교시' WHEN B.TIME2 IN('2','10','18','26','34') THEN '2교시' WHEN B.TIME2 IN('3','11','19','27','35') THEN '3교시' WHEN B.TIME2 IN('4','12','20','28','36') THEN '4교시' WHEN B.TIME2 IN('5','13','21','29','37') THEN '5교시' WHEN B.TIME2 IN('6','14','22','30','38') THEN '6교시' WHEN B.TIME2 IN('7','15','23','31','39') THEN '7교시' WHEN B.TIME2 IN('8','16','24','32','40') THEN '8교시' ELSE '수업 없음 ' END) AS TIME4 , A.GRADES , C.INPUT_NAME , B.ETC FROM MY_LECTURE A JOIN LECTURE B ON A.SUBJECTS=B.VALUE AND A.LECTURE_NO1=B.TIME1 JOIN MEMBER C ON B.INPUT_ID = C.INPUT_ID WHERE A.STATUS = 'Y' ) S, (SELECT @ROWNUM:=0) R WHERE S.USER_ID = #{value } ORDER BY S.IDX ASC
